# Azure Cognitive Services

Use `azure-cognitive-services/<model>` with VoltAgent's model router.

## Quick start

```ts
import { Agent } from "@voltagent/core";

const agent = new Agent({
  name: "azure-cognitive-services-agent",
  instructions: "You are a helpful assistant",
  model: "azure-cognitive-services/claude-haiku-4-5",
});
```

## Environment variables

- `AZURE_COGNITIVE_SERVICES_RESOURCE_NAME`
- `AZURE_COGNITIVE_SERVICES_API_KEY`

## Provider package

`@ai-sdk/azure`

## Default base URL

Not listed.

You can override the base URL by setting `AZURE_COGNITIVE_SERVICES_BASE_URL`.

## Provider docs

- https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-services/openai/concepts/models
